attributes.action: Stop charging for the use of hospital carparks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently a problem at many NHS hopsitals where extortionate car parking fees are to be paid hourly whilst visiting. This is disgraceful way of money-making, purely out of peoples pain and misfortune. The last thing on peoples minds when visiting a loved one, or arriving to be treated at a hospital is whether they have enough change to park their car!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
